title: Smart Learning Design Studio for Sustainable Architecture

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic architectural design and sustainability, with experience in digital tools
context.additional_context: A sustainable construction technology competency enhancement course for corporate professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the application of computational integration tools (e.g., BIM, parametric modeling) in sustainable architectural design.
Learners can execute a design process considering energy efficiency and material reduction following a three-stage framework.
Learners can generate prototypes by applying automated architectural design simulation tools in mobile-based microlearning environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
